notesStmt.note: Thick, stiff vellum becoming translucent. Manufacturing holes and small edge losses, possibly rodent. A few breaks and tears along foot. Darkening at edges.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msItem.title: Piyuṭim u-tefilot le-Purim פיוטים ותפלות לפורים

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Byzantine square script of the 16th to 17th century.

binding.p: BM in-house. Boxed. Spine: 'Purim Ritual. Vellum Scroll. Hebrew. Brit. Mus. Or. 5435.'

history.provenance:
Acquisition:
S. Raffalovich: purchased by the British Museum from him on 12 July 1898.
